WorkItem.ClosedComment: It's because the Shadow Options Pane hasn't been made yet, so there's no Rotation to make DPS out of
WorkItem.Description:
Launch rawr3
Load saved character profile (Dachquox, Dunemaul-EU)
Select Gear in menu above right pane
 
Result:
Right pane shows only survivability stats (green)
 
Clicking the sorting Menu, I only have 2 options: Overall and Alphabetical
 
After the above, I tried loading my char from the armory, which appeared to freeze rawr3. No progress, and neither the Cancel All button or the window close x have any effect...
WorkItem.Summary: [ShadowPriest] Only shows Survivability after loading a character

Comments.Message: Here is the saved character profile I loaded:

If I select Gear view right after starting Rawr3, it does show the 3 colored stats: Dps-burst, dps-sustained and survivability.

But when I then load the saved character (enclosed), it only shows surbivability...

I fiddled around...

It seems it's related to the Shadow Priest profile. If I switch to Holy Priest, I get to see all three scores.

If I'm right, I'll wait for a fix before testing further, as I only play my Shadow priest.
same thing is happening for me. only showing survivability. I am using rawr3 on firefox with my macbook pro
